review_title: The Worst Job I've ever had
job_title: Community Partnership Coordinator in Hammersmith, England
pros: The cause, and that's about it.
cons:
Pre covid so bare that in mind. My whole team worked in Leeds whilst I worked in London. It was very socially isolating. There was 0 need for me to be in the office so I asked if I could WFH as being in London on £22,500 was very difficultw hen adding commuting price on top. Told I was too junior. Didn't make sense as had never missed a deadline.

Told not to talk in corporate meetings, and one time had my mic muted and told just to do nothing but take minutes. When you never see your team and your once a month in person meeting is cancelled because they cant be bothered to invest in your happiness at work, don't expect much.

Very very cliquey partnerships team. I left and had a far happier time.
